Reviews.Title: Poor Service and product
Reviews.Author: Daniel C. Pelletier
Reviews.Content: Camera only lasted 2 months then died. Returned for repairs and 2 months later that camera died. Now we have to pay for repairs since it's past 3 months since original order.STAY AWAY from this product, will just die in 2 months and then they will charge you to fix their defective product!

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD bullet security camera, Color DSP
Weatherproof indoor outdoor housing, IP66, cable through bracket
700 TV Lines horizontal resolution, NTSC System
Build-in 4-9mm Varifocal Lens and 42 IR Leds for night vision
Package included:1 x high resolution camera, 1 x 12V DC power supply and 1 x security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: Videosecu 700TVL High Resolution Built-in 1/3'' Sony Effio CCD Infrared Bullet Security Camera Day Night Vision Outdoor 42 IR LEDs Varifocal Lens Camera for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus Power Supply WG4
